project_abstract.cdata: The proposed credit would be used to meet 100 percent of the foreign exchange expenditures for directly imported capital goods and services for subprojects sponsored by private productive enterprises to be broadly defined to include not only manufacturing, but also agro-industries, construction, and tourism projects.
